Package eu.mihosoft.freerouting.designforms.specctra

Class Shape

java.lang.Object
eu.mihosoft.freerouting.designforms.specctra.Shape
Direct Known Subclasses:
Circle, Path, Polygon, Rectangle
public abstract class Shape extends Object
Describes a shape in a Specctra dsn file.

    • write_scope

      public abstract void write_scope(IndentFileWriter p_file, IdentifierType p_identifier) throws IOException
      Writes a shape scope to a Specctra dsn file.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • write_scope_int

      public abstract void write_scope_int(IndentFileWriter p_file, IdentifierType p_identifier) throws IOException
      Writes a shape scope to a Specctra session file. In a session file all coordinates must be integer.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • read_scope

      public static Shape read_scope(Scanner p_scanner, LayerStructure p_layer_structure)
      Reads shape scope from a Specctra dsn file. If p_layer_structure == null, only Layer.PCB and Layer.Signal are expected, no induvidual layers.

    • read_polyline_path_scope

      public static PolylinePath read_polyline_path_scope(Scanner p_scanner, LayerStructure p_layer_structure)
      Reads an object of type PolylinePath from the dsn-file.

    • read_area_scope

      public static eu.mihosoft.freerouting.designforms.specctra.Shape.ReadAreaScopeResult read_area_scope(Scanner p_scanner, LayerStructure p_layer_structure, boolean p_skip_window_scopes)
      Reads a shape , which may contain holes from a specctra dsn-file. The first shape in the shape_list of the result is the border of the area. The other shapes in the shape_list are holes (windows).

    • read_rectangle_scope

      public static Rectangle read_rectangle_scope(Scanner p_scanner, LayerStructure p_layer_structure)
      Reads a rectangle scope from a Specctra dsn file. If p_layer_structure == null, only Layer.PCB and Layer.Signal are expected, no induvidual layers.

    • read_polygon_scope

      public static Polygon read_polygon_scope(Scanner p_scanner, LayerStructure p_layer_structure)
      Reads a closed polygon scope from a Specctra dsn file. If p_layer_structure == null, only Layer.PCB and Layer.Signal are expected, no induvidual layers.

    • read_circle_scope

      public static Circle read_circle_scope(Scanner p_scanner, LayerStructure p_layer_structure)
      Reads a circle scope from a Specctra dsn file.

    • read_polygon_path_scope

      public static PolygonPath read_polygon_path_scope(Scanner p_scanner, LayerStructure p_layer_structure)
      Reads an object of type Path from the dsn-file.

    • transform_area_to_board

      public static Area transform_area_to_board(Collection<Shape> p_area, CoordinateTransform p_coordinate_transform)
      Transforms a shape with holes to the board coordinate system. The first shape in the Collection p_area is the border, the other shapes are holes of the area.

    • transform_area_to_board_rel

      public static Area transform_area_to_board_rel(Collection<Shape> p_area, CoordinateTransform p_coordinate_transform)
      Transforms the relative coordinates of a shape with holes to the board coordinate system. The first shape in the Collection p_area is the border, the other shapes are holes of the area.

    • write_hole_scope

      public void write_hole_scope(IndentFileWriter p_file, IdentifierType p_identifier_type) throws IOException
      Throws:
      IOException

    • transform_to_board

      public abstract Shape transform_to_board(CoordinateTransform p_coordinate_transform)
      Transforms a specctra dsn shape to a geometry.planar.Shape.

    • bounding_box

      public abstract Rectangle bounding_box()
      Returns the smallest axis parallel rectangle containing this shape.

    • transform_to_board_rel

      public abstract Shape transform_to_board_rel(CoordinateTransform p_coordinate_transform)
      Transforms the relative (vector) coordinates of a specctra dsn shape to a geometry.planar.Shape.
